alert.note: Alert for Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 3:14AM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...A mix of rain and freezing rain expected, possibly with periods of light snow. Total snow and sleet accumulations up to one inch, with ice accumulations from a light glaze to one tenth of an inch possible. * WHERE...Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...Until Noon MST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads and surfaces where a light glaze of ice accumulates. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light rain showers will develop early this morning and continue through morning hours. Freezing rain is likely in areas that have temperatures below freezing. However, icing will also occur in some areas where air temperatures are above freezing, as rain will freeze on surfaces that still below freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
